metadata.longDescription: Azure API Management helps organizations publish APIs to external, partner, and internal developers, providing cross-cutting features such as access control, rate limiting, monitoring, event logging, and response caching.

plans.name: Existing
plans.description: Deploys to an existing API service instance only; disallows creating a new one

plans.name: Developer
plans.description: The Developer tier is for API Management trial, development, and functional test. Customers should not use this tier for production.

plans.name: Standard
plans.description: The Standard tier offers increased performance, the ability to extend performance further by provisioning additional units, and an SLA.

bullets: API Calls : 7 M per day per unit
Data Transfer : 32 GB per day per unit

plans.name: Premium
plans.description: The Premium tier offers the best performance and SLA, multi-region deployment, Azure Active Directory integration, and VPN.

bullets: API Calls : 32 KM per day per unit
Data Transfer : 161 GB per day per unit
